item.title: Mozilla Hubs Experiments
item.description: How do new, exciting and at the same time challenging technologies, such as virtual reality, find their way into university teaching? One of my articles describes an interdisciplinary project that addresses precisely this question. Our goal is to represent the periodic table of elements as a network of virtual environments in which each element has its own space.
